title: Forbidden Love
description: Jude and Haven share a secret. One he willingly hides and she tries to forget, but it regardless, it has tied them together.It's not until their relationship is discovered that Haven has a choice to make. She can pine for the man who walked away or choose a new path.But secrets have a way of showing themselves, making it difficult for Haven to let go...And when she does, can Jude live with the consequences?
author: Lola Stark
